item.title: Python on M1 native Macbook Pro 2021
item.author: Author
item.description: What have we got After upgrading to the new Macbook Pro with the M1 Pro processor at the end of 2021, it was time to install a newer version of Python. $ /echo $PATH /usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/bin:/usr/sbin:/sbin $ which python /usr/bin/python $ python --version Python 2.7.18 While MacOS includes a version of Python I wanted a newer version and to keep it seperate from what Apple was using the other version for, and perhaps to have multiple environments for development.
